name: Path of the Magi Beta
description:
If the game appears as a black rectangle in your browser, try reloading the page.
Welcome to the Beta Test for Path of the Magi!

We have a lot of questions about our game all of which are attached.

For PC and Mac:
Z is the A button
X is the B button
Right Shift is Select
Enter is Start
WSAD is the Joypad
